title: Font Configuration
description: Typography design tokens for font families and styles

url.description: Font file URL or Google Fonts URL

specs.given: a font with only family defined
specs.then: it should accept font family as the only required property

specs.given: a font with family and fallback stack
specs.then: it should provide graceful fallback for missing fonts
it should accept weight values from 100-900 in increments of 100

specs.given: a font with style set to 'italic'
specs.then: it should accept normal, italic, or oblique styles

specs.given: a font with size '16px' and lineHeight '1.5'
specs.when: font defines default size and line spacing
specs.then: it should set typography metrics for body text

specs.when: font includes letter spacing for display text
specs.then: it should apply character spacing for readability
it should accept none, uppercase, lowercase, or capitalize

specs.given: a font with Google Fonts URL
specs.when: font is loaded from external source
specs.then: it should accept valid font URL for remote loading

specs.given: a complete font config with all properties (family, fallback, weights, style, size, lineHeight, letterSpacing, transform, url)
specs.then: it should support comprehensive typography settings

specs.given: a theme with multiple font categories (title, body, mono)
specs.when: different fonts are defined for headings, body text, and code
specs.then: it should support semantic font system for all UI contexts
